doctext.text: Performance Monitors are not implemented.

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Debug Extension and related blocks are not implemented.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Models have been extensively tested by Imperas. ARM Cortex-M models have been successfully used by customers to simulate the Micrium uC/OS-II kernel and FreeRTOS.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: The model is configured with 0 interrupts and 2 priority bits (use override_numInterrupts parameter to change the number of interrupts; the number of priority bits is fixed in this profile).

doctext.name: txt_1
doctext.text: Thumb instructions are supported.

doctext.name: txt_2
doctext.text: MPU is not implemented. Use parameter override_MPU_TYPE to enable it if required.

doctext.name: txt_3
doctext.text: SysTick timer is implemented. Use parameter SysTickPresent to disable it if required.

doctext.name: txt_4
doctext.text: Unprivileged/Privileged Extension is not implemented. Use parameter unprivilegedExtension to enable it if required.

doctext.name: txt_5
doctext.text: VTOR register is not implemented. Use parameter VTORPresent to enable it if required.
